name: Dusk Project
description:
This is my first crack at using RPG Maker and I'm learning as I go. I would love any feedback or advice. This is an early access look at the game's prologue. It takes about 20-30 minutes. 

Note: A Keyboard is required to play this game. There is no touch screen control or mouse functionality. 

How to play: 

Use the Arrow Keys to Move.  

Enter or Space to Select. 

Esc to Go Back or Access the In Game Menu Screen. 

Shift can be used during dialog scenes to pull up the Message Log.
